Entries.262214001/n Si_SF_M2/t 1350 1410/f Sebas: continue/5 7/farmer 3 5 2 Vincent 5 5 2 Sebastian 4 6 0/fade/pause 300/speak Sebastian "Alright, does anyone have questions before we get started?"/pause 200/quickQuestion Do you have any questions?#Nope.#Why is Vincent here?#What are we doing here again?(break)speak Sebastian "Good, let's get started."(break)speak Sebastian "Sam's letting me borrow him."\speak Vincent "My big brother said I can touch as many frogs as I want as long as I don't tell Mom!"(break)speak Sebastian "We are starting a conservation project for the endangered Gourmand Frog species."/pause 200/move Sebastian 2 0 1/pause 200/advancedMove Sebastian true -4 0 3 200 4 0 1 200/speak Sebastian "As a conservation project, our objectives are to enhance the survival prospects of the Gourmand Frog population with respect to the local environment, study and monitor local Gourmand Frog behavioral patterns, and spread awareness about Gourmand Frogs and the dangers they face.#$b#Our first step will be to set up habitats around the nearby lake where they can gather and thrive.#$b#To do that we'll need natural materials.#$b#I can get wood and stone from my mom.#$b#That leaves things like moss, fiber, and bug meat."/pause 200/speak Vincent "I can get bug meat!#$b#It's the squishy pink stuff right?"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Yeah, that would be good.#$b#@, what would you like to gather? Remember, we'll need a lot of it."/pause 200/quickQuestion Which material would you like to contribute?#Moss.#Fiber.(break)addQuest Si_SF_Q2\speak Sebastian "Great, I'll get the fiber.#$b#Bring it to me once you've gathered it all."(break)addQuest Si_SF_Q3\speak Sebastian "Great, I'll get the moss.#$b#Bring it to me once you've gathered it all."/pause 200/stopAdvancedMoves/pause 200/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 200/speak Sebastian "It'll be a long road, but with our help, the Gourmand Frog population will grow to levels not seen since people started living in the valley.#$b#Let's get to it!$7"/emote farmer 20 true/emote Vincent 20/pause 300/end/fade
